long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App for CryptoStrikers.

When clicked, the app shows the last sold card, price, & time of sale.

Click the right arrow to scroll through the last 10 sold cards (with the left arrow to go back).

If a badge icon appears with a number, this means that there have been new sales.
